issues.description: The Meal constructor signature in the template (Meal(String[] ingredients, String name)) is reversed compared to the problem statement UML (+Meal(String, String[])) and the solution implementation. Furthermore, the sample Main code in the template invokes new Meal("cowBoyStew", new String[]{...}), which does not match the template constructor, causing compilation failures and student confusion.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the Meal constructor in the template with the UML and sample usage by swapping the parameter order to public Meal(String name, String[] ingredients).
